definition: life (a person's whole life)/in one's entire life
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: She was thrilled to be appreciated by strangers for the first time in her life.
sentences.chinese: 生平第一次有陌生人欣賞自己，她有些喜出望外。

sentences.english: The first part mainly introduces Cai Xiang's life experiences and excursion.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分介紹蔡襄的生平與交遊。

sentences.english: They deserve to be seen, not just visually but biographically.
sentences.chinese: 這些女性值得被觀看，不僅是外貌，還有她們的生平。

sentences.english: This paper conducted a research in his family and career.
sentences.chinese: 文章就魯明善的家世及其生平仕履進行了研究。

sentences.english: Part Two briefly introduces the life of Gao Heng as well as his scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 論文第二部分簡述高亨先生的生平及其學術成就。

sentences.english: About a year and a half ago, I took part in my very first English Speech Contest .
sentences.chinese: 大概一年半以前，我參加了生平第一次演講比賽。

sentences.english: I never in my life saw anything more elegant than their dresses.
sentences.chinese: 我生平沒有看見過任何東西比她們的衣飾更講究。

sentences.english: Such a change in his mentality was closely related to the difficulties and dangers he met with in his life.
sentences.chinese: 夢陽晚年心態的這種變化，跟他的生平遭際密切相關。

sentences.english: All this throws new light on the study of Chen Chen's life story and his poetry.
sentences.chinese: 這些都爲研究陳忱的生平事蹟和詩歌提供了新的材料。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 is the summarize introduction of Huang sheng's life and works.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是對黃生生平和著作的簡括介紹。

sentences.english: Some people live in a in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 有人一合鍾裏就渡過了生平。

sentences.english: The first chapter gives a survey of all Florus'life and his works.
sentences.chinese: 第一章介紹了弗羅魯斯的生平及其著作概況。

sentences.english: However, his life story is seldom discovered in the historical documents.
sentences.chinese: 可是他的生平事蹟卻很少見諸史料記載。

sentences.english: The first chapter introduces the life of Andong He.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要介紹了何安東生平。

sentences.english: We introduce the MAX SCHELER's thought and life generally in the beginning of this paper.
sentences.chinese: 在引子部分對舍勒的生平與思想做簡單的介紹。

sentences.english: The first bundle of flower in my life should be a gift in women's day.
sentences.chinese: 生平第一次收到的花竟然是三八節的花。

definition: the present age/in office/the current office holder
(of a deceased) during one's life/while living
a matter for regret or resentment
an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
a matter for regret/sth that is a (great) pity
at all times and in all places (idiom)
